chargeHist.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

from S.B., COC   re: Def was found competent on 7-18-17 at Comp Hrg before EML.  CRT set Prelim Hrg in 17CF48, but there are no Hrgs set for the other cases & they are not set to tag along w/ 17CF48
PER EML:  They should get assigned to whatever Judge has them.  I don't have any of the cases

State has no objection to Court accepting Dr Stress' conclusions.
Zachar - Def maintains he is competent.
Def - Yes - I am 100% competent.
Locante - no comment one way or another.
Zachar and Kellis both stipulate to Dr Stress' Report.
COURT: Based on Dr Stress' Report, find the Defendant is competent to proceed
with his criminal charges at this point.
COURT: MR ZACHAR, YOU ARE DONE WITH YOUR REPRESENTATION.
17CF48 has not had a PH, it needs to be set with TWB, get a date for that.
Locante addresses bond, requests Sig Bond.
Court: 8 cases, the safety of the public becomes a wwighty matter, I think
$5000.00 cash is appropriate.  He already has $1000 posted so he needs to
come up with $4000 cash to cove all cases (the $1000 cash is in 16CF886).
Get a date for PH from TWB

Def in custody w/atty Locante
Locante: still waiting for comp exam
CRT: needs to be set for hearing

Comments of parties.
Court: Find a day when both Doctors are available and get a new
date/time for that.  We will need about an hour - asap.
Locante addresses bond.
Court: Cash bond will remain as previously set.
Dr Stress

Zachar here as advosary counsel on Competency issue.  No report yet.
Court: Request for Evaluation was only in 17CF48 - it needs to be copied into each file.
Set for sometime after 04-21-17 - All cases.

Locante - Competency has been raised, there is a hearing set for Tuesday.
Bond to Continue.
Dr Trueman
